枎字的基本解释

枎
fú
〔枎疏〕古同“扶疏”，枝叶茂盛，四下分布。
古书上说的一种树：“五沃之土……宜彼群木，桐、柞、枎、櫄。”

枎
fū
古同“柎”，草木子房；亦指花萼。

枎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》防無切，平虞，奉。］
(1)木名。
(2)见“枎疏”。

枎字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　枎； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页515第06
【唐韻】防無切【集韻】馮無切，?音夫。【說文】枎疎，四布也。　又木名。【管子·地員篇】五沃之土，桐柞枎欓。　又【集韻】與柎同。芳無切，音敷。華萼也。柎字原从林从孚作。

枎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
枎字的起名意思

形容枝叶茂盛，四下分布，如枎疏，也指古书上说的一种树。

枎
Basic explanation of words
枎
fú
〔Jiao Shu〕 In ancient times, "Fu Shu", with lush branches and leaves, distributed all around.
A kind of tree said in ancient books: "Five fertile soil... suitable for other trees, Tong, Tussah, Shao, Shao."
枎
fū
In ancient times, the same "Qiao", grass and wood ovary; also refers to the calyx.
枎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" Fang Wuqi, Pingyu, Feng. ]
(1) Wooden name.
(2) See "Shu Shu".
枎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枎; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 515 06
[Tang Yun] Fang Wuqie [Ji Yun] Feng Wuqie, the sound husband. [Said the text] Jiujiu, four cloths are also.　Also wooden name. [Guanzi·Diyuan Chapter] Five fertile soil, Tongzhuoqiao.　[Jiyun] is the same as Chi. Fang Wuqie, Yin Fu. Hua E also. The word "Qi" was originally made by Lin Congfu.
枎

Old glyph
枎
Name meaning
Describes the luxuriant branches and leaves, distributed in all directions, like sparse, also refers to a kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
fū
сущ. * фу (название дерева)
